source_objects.title: Travel
source_objects.description: Discover new tricks when planning a trip, budgeting for a vacation, keeping a record or journel from an adventure, and much more.

Understand a Definition of Adventure Motorcycling.

items.title: Hooray for the Holidays!

items.title: Hiking the Northern Ways to Santiago de Campostela Basilica!

visible_instructors.title: Scott Brown
visible_instructors.name: Scott
visible_instructors.job_title: Major State University Finance Professor, Investments Expert

items.headline: Imagine walking ancient Galician historic footpaths into the Metropolitan Cathedral Basilica of St James of Compostela!
objectives_summary: Discover the fastest routes to earn the coveted Campostella.
Use the safest porter and lodging systems to reduce your discomfort.
Map the safest way to the Santiago de Campostella basilica.

items.title: How Some Hikers Almost Always Know Their Way in the Wild.
items.headline: Give Me 4.5 Hours – And I’ll Give You the Secret of Hiking Without Being Afraid of Getting Lost!
objectives_summary: Enjoy the beauty of untapped wilderness areas, without stressing about how he will navigate to it or, how to get back without getting lost.

items.title: Guide to visit the historical cities of Belgium
items.headline: Which cities and places to visit during your short holiday in Belgium
objectives_summary: What to visit during your short holiday in Belgium.
The historical cities you have to visit: Brussels, Antwerp, Ghent and Bruges.
The ‘must see’ tourist attractions in each city with information about the history of buildings and monuments.

items.title: (Free Course) New Normal Abroad
items.headline: Life/Travel Under Lockdown
objectives_summary: Travel and Life Abroad Post Lockdown

items.title: Amtrak Across America | How to Ride the Train Across America
items.headline: The Complete Guide to Long-Distance Train Travel in America
objectives_summary: How to plan an Amtrak long-distance trip including choosing your destination and getting the lowest price possible.
Information about the onboard Experience and what you should expect.
Insider information and tips to help make your trip go are smoothly as possible.

items.title: Explore Waterton National Park Before You Go
items.headline: We are taking you on a typical Two Cowboys experience to Waterton National Park
objectives_summary: The Two Travelling Cowboys are inviting you to join us as an armchair traveller. We are taking you on a typical Two Cowboys experience to Waterton National Park.

In this program, we invite you to an entertaining and informative online travel excursion. You go onsite and undercover with the Two Cowboys as we show you what to experience and expect in the underground of our favourite travel destination.
We will continue to add updated content as we learn more about the places, people and attractions during our travels.

items.title: Online Resources for Exploring Old Railways in the UK
items.headline: The websites to use when researching old railways and other historical sites in the UK including old maps.
objectives_summary: How to explore the routes of old railway lines in the UK and their remains in the modern landscape
The digitised old maps of the UK available online
Online records of historical locations in the UK

items.title: Обучение яхтингу - от новичка до матроса
items.headline: Начальный теоретический курс для яхтсменов
objectives_summary: понимать процессы, происходящие на яхте
эффективно помогать шкиперу в управлении яхтой
использовать полученные знания для быстрого приобретения практических навыков управления яхтой

items.title: Aprenda Como Viajar Usando Apenas Milhas Aéreas
items.headline: As passagens aéreas não serão mais a desculpa para você não viajar.
objectives_summary: Viajar Sem Pagar Passagem Aérea usando Pontos e Milhas Aéreas - Trata-se de um treinamento que vai te proporcionar realizar suas viagens sem pagar passagens aéreas.   Para isso utilizamos como método, diversas técnicas avançadas de Pontos e Milhas que te permitem ganhar pontos e milhas de até 4 formas diferentes na mesma compra.   Consequentemente, se você é uma pessoa que está habituada a acumular pontos, somente no cartão de crédito. Com o nosso curso você vai aumentar seus ganhos em até 1000% e até 10X mais rápido, sendo conservador nos números.

items.title: Caminho de Santiago: O Guia de Preparação Mais Completo!
items.headline: Tudo o que você quer saber para fazer o Caminho de Santiago
objectives_summary: Fazer o Caminho de Santiago com total confiança
Planejar o aspecto financeiro do seu Caminho de Santiago
Economizar Dinheiro organizando melhor o seu Caminho de Santiago
